name: 天国病院-Heaven's Hospital-(Demo)
description:
This game is a trial version of "Heaven's Hospital-" scheduled to be released on November 1st of this year.

You can play the first day of Easy Difficulty in Basic Mode.

The following is the product version information.

1. Nurses with injections that cause various abnormal conditions will attack, so collect key items and consumable items, guide them with sound, etc. to protect yourself and come to the hospital room Let's stop it.

2. Survive for 7 days in basic mode and leave the hospital safely.

3. In endless night mode, collect point items and survive for as long as possible to aim for a high score.

4. There are three difficulty levels: easy, normal, and hard.

5. As an assist function, you can select either a mode in which you can check the position of the player / enemy on the map, a mode in which you can see the enemy's field of view, or a mode without assistance.

6. Costumes will be released according to the achievements.

7. Supports 16 languages.
